# sdmflowR

<!-- badges: start -->
<!-- badges: end -->

The goal of sdmflowR is to help SDM (species distribution modelling) practitioner easier flow with the task of preparing species data and environmental layers needed for species distribution modelling.

## Installation
At the moment only development version is available from [GitHub](https://github.com/) and you can easily install it with:

``` r
# install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_github("grgurev/sdmflowR")
```
